title: Diprovena
description: A tiny shop in the Dos Caracoles shopping centre. When entering from Av. Providencia one has to go to the back and then up. Store offers a complete variety of vegetal proteins-based products as veg franks, veg burgers, veg beef, veg ham, and veg sausages. Also, natural products like quinoa, linseed, stevia, plus shampoos, teas, oriental soy sauce and rice noodle, chili sauce. Delivery service is available.
